sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'DirectivesAssignment'; public myLinks: {name: string, value: string}[] = [ {name: 'Component 1', value: 'comp1'}, {name: 'Component 2', value: 'comp2'}, {name: 'Component 3', value: 'comp3'}, ]; public currDisplay: string = ''; public showMenu: boolean = false; constructor() { this.currDisplay = ''; this.showMenu = false; } switchContent(content: string) { this.currDisplay = content; } changeMenuDisplay() { this.showMenu = !this.showMenu; } }
